data.name: ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CASH_RECEIPT_ID from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail1
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, INTERFACE_TRAN_ID, ADJUSTMENT_IND, COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, RECEIVED_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_DATE, OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR, OBLGOR_SSN, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REFUNDED_AMT, DISTRIBUTED_AMT, COLLAMT_APPL_IND from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (INTERFACE_TRAN_ID = @interfaceTranId)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail2
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailCashReceiptTypeCashReceiptEvent
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, INTERFACE_TRAN_ID, ADJUSTMENT_IND, COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, RECEIVED_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_DATE, OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR, OBLGOR_SSN, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REFUNDED_AMT, DISTRIBUTED_AMT, COLLAMT_APPL_IND from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (INTERFACE_TRAN_ID = @interfaceTranId) and (COURT_ORDER_NUMBER = @courtOrderNumber) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailRlnRsn
data.value: select top(1) CRDTL_RLN_RSN_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_CRDTL_RLN_RSN where CODE = @code

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatHistoryCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRD_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CDS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST where (@crdIdentifier = CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate)

data.name: ReadCollection
data.value: select top(1) COLL_ID, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, DIST_MTD, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, AR_NUMBER from CKT_COLLECTION where (@crdId = CRD_ID) and (@crvId = CRV_ID) and (@cstId = CST_ID) and (@crtType = CRT_TYPE) and (DIST_MTD = @distMtd)

data.name: ReadCollectionAdjustmentReason
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID, OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_CD, OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_NM from CKT_COLL_ADJ_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_CD = 'COURTAD'

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetail1
data.value: update CKT_CR_DETAIL set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, COLLAMT_APPL_IND = @collamtApplInd where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CRD_ID = @crdId)

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetail2
data.value: update CKT_CR_DETAIL set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, REFUNDED_AMT = @refundedAmt, COLLAMT_APPL_IND = @collamtApplInd where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CRD_ID = @crdId)
